title: Re-updating after Update?
body:
Is anyone else having this issue?

I updated League earlier today, as per usual, and the 3 times I've restarted League (either because the client got really buggy/slow or because I was taking a break) I've had to update the game again, despite having updated with both the Alpha and Live clients, the latter of which I did in an attempt to see which client was better to update the game with.

As I type this I'm waiting for the game to update... again.

replies.body:
Good thing I saw this post, I just came across the same issue. I updated this morning and opened it up just fine about 30 minutes ago. However, I just closed it to reopen it to find that I have to install the 1gb update again. 

Loving the alpha though! Good work!

We are in the alpha test and patches go out much more frequently than with a finalized product. Bear with us as we improve and polish the client, thank you for your patience and I hope that after your fourth update your experience with the alpha is very positive!
It certainly has been thus far, thank you.
